QuestData.Title: Pick Your Fate
QuestData.Description: It costs the Alliance approximately fifty gold to train a miner, two hundred to train an engineer, and three hundred to train a foreman. Every Alliance goon that we kill isn't just a military victory... it's a financial one.$b$bNow get down there and destroy their workers!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Nethergarde Miners, 3 Nethergarde Engineers, and 3 Nethergarde Foremen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Just because you're costing the Alliance hundreds of gold doesn't mean I'm going to pay you hundreds of gold. So don't even think about asking.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, friend. I like the way you do business.
